00057             function                __construct()
00058             {
00059                   try
00060                   {
00061                         $this->FileInputAccess = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00062                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00063                         
00064                         $this->SupportedExtensions[ 'default' ] = array( 'jpg' , 'jpeg' , 'gif' , 'bmp' , 'png' , 'tif' , 
00065                               'tiff' , 'doc' , 'docx' , 'ppt' , 'pptx' , 'rtf' , 'xls' , 'xslx' , 'pdf'
00066                         );
00067                                                                         
00068                         $this->SupportedExtensions[ 'images' ] = array( 
00069                               'jpg' , 'jpeg' , 'gif' , 'bmp' , 'png' , 'tiff' , 'tif'
00070                         );
00071                         
00072                         $this->SupportedExtensions[ 'archives' ] = array( 
00073                               'zip' , '7zip' , 'gz' , 'gz2' , 'tar' , 'rar' , 'arc'
00074                         );
00075                         
00076                         $this->SupportedExtensions[ 'all' ] = array( '*' );
00077                   }
00078                   catch( Exception $e )
00079                   {
00080                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00110             function                get_extensions( $Type , $AsString = false )
00111             {
00112                   try
00113                   {
00114                         $Extensions = array();
00115                         
00116                         if( isset( $this->SupportedExtensions[ $Type ] ) === false )
00117                         {
00118                               throw( new Exception( "File type \"$Type\" is undefined" ) );
00119                         }
00120                         
00121                         return( 
00122                               $AsString ? 
00123                                     '*.'.implode( ';*.' , $this->SupportedExtensions[ $Type ] ) : 
00124                                     $this->SupportedExtensions[ $Type ] 
00125                         );
00126                   }
00127                   catch( Exception $e )
00128                   {
00129                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00130                   }
00131             }
00132             
00155             function                get_file_filters( $Type )
00156             {
00157                   try
00158                   {
00159                         $FileExtensions = $this->get_extensions( $Type , true );
00160                               
00161                         if( $Type == 'default' )
00162                         {
00163                               $FileDescription = 'Supported types';
00164                         }
00165                         elseif( $Type == 'images' )
00166                         {
00167                               $FileDescription = 'Images';
00168                         }
00169                         elseif( $Type == 'archives' )
00170                         {
00171                               $FileDescription = 'Zip archives';
00172                         }
00173                         elseif( $Type == 'all' )
00174                         {
00175                               $FileDescription = 'All files';
00176                         }
00177                         
00178                         return( array( $FileExtensions , $FileDescription ) );
00179                   }
00180                   catch( Exception $e )
00181                   {
00182                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00183                   }
00184             }
00185             
00208             function                get_by_id( $id )
00209             {
00210                   try
00211                   {
00212                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00213                         
00214                         $Records = $this->FileInputAccess->unsafe_select( "id = $id" );
00215 
00216                         if( count( $Records ) !== 1 )
00217                         {
00218                               throw( new Exception( 'An error occured while record fetching' ) );
00219                         }
00220                         else
00221                         {
00222                               return( $Records[ 0 ] );
00223                         }
00224                   }
00225                   catch( Exception $e )
00226                   {
00227                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00228                   }
00229             }
